titleStmt.title: Mr. Pepys to the Right Honourable Sir Francis Child, Kt. Lord Mayor, and to the Court of Aldermen upon the present state of Christ-Hospital.
titleStmt.author: Pepys, Samuel, 1633-1703.
Child, Francis, Sir, 1642-1713, recipient.
City of London (England). Court of Common Council, recipient.

notesStmt.note: Copy stained, with heavy print show-through.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
